author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Instead of re-inventing the stream wheel, use our existing output
stream machinery for getting file contents.
(streamFileContent): Remove bufSize param, and use an OutputStream object.
(streamFileContent): Remove all the custom stream handling, and just use
Create and use an OutputStream wrapper object.
